name: GUMM'S CANDYLAND (very early version)
description:
alpha 0.11

Added:

- A new button for the cameras

- The "change cam" animation now plays when an enemy enters or exits a room (now they don't disappear)

Fixed:

- White overlay that showed when spamming the camera buttons

- Now you can change from camera 7 to camera 8

_____________________________________________________________________

Controls: Space to open/close cameras, and numbers from 1 to 8 to change cameras.

You can open the debug menu by pressing C-D-1

You can't win

This is Gumm
